translated: The Elders’ Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Sereyya
I was a reciter and a memoriser,
having mastered the three Vedas,🔽and I lived in a secluded place
and after putting them in a bag
I hung it on a tree.
Padumuttara, the knower of the world,
came to me while wandering for alms.
With a confident mind and a happy mind,🔽I gave a fruit to the Buddha;
